column1: Uchi////I was in Houston on a business trip and met up with an old friend who suggested we go to Uchi. Â She said it was the talk of the town... We ordered so much from the menu and I didn't hate any of it. My favorites were the Brussel sprouts which I need to make a dupe at home of
column5: and of course fried milk for dessert. Ahhmazing. If I'm ever in Houston again it is definitely on my list of places to visit again!
